name: TD Strategy of Three kingdoms/塔防三国
name_original: TD Strategy of Three kingdoms/塔防三国
description:
The Three Kingdoms of Tower Defense is a survival pass game to test defensive tactics. Players need to achieve unified hegemony in the world through reasonable arrangement and a combination of luck.

The collocation of five special arms:

Ordinary soldiers can get soldiers of other professions by synthesizing. The game now includes soldiers, knights, gunmen, archers and slings.

Advancement of military services:

Through the synthesis of two identical soldiers, it will be possible to get advanced arms. The ability of advanced arms will be greatly improved. So try to synthesize and acquire higher arms.

A large number of checkpoints:

At present, the game is equipped with 100 levels to meet your challenges.
